items.creator: Ivan Mehta
items.summary: 无法生成摘要（API请求失败）。
items.translated_title: WhatsApp is rolling out a new stricter security setting to protect users from cyber attacts
items.content: Days after Meta was sued over alleged false privacy claims surrounding its chat app WhatsApp, the company has rolled out a new setting to protect users against cyber attacks. The feature, called Strict Account Settings, adds restrictions like automatically blocking media and attachments from unknown senders, and silencing calls from unknown numbers. Under this setting, link previews […]

items.translated_title: Amazon is closing its physical Amazon Go and Amazon Fresh stores
